http.title: Site Not Configured | 404 Not Found
http.html:
404

The site you were looking for couldn't be found.

This domain is successfully pointed at WP Engine, but is not configured for an account on our platform.

  • If you just signed up, we're still likely creating your account.
  • Did you add this domain to your install?
  • Did you point DNS to the correct IP address or CNAME?
If you've completed the steps above, or need more help, please contact us and we can help get your site up and running in no time.

Data you can trust.
And people who care.

Delivering for clients since 1997.

Find out more

Data collection from RED

At RED our priority is servicing and exceeding our clients expectations. We do this by appointing an account manager to every client, so there is always a dedicated point of contact.

 

Account managers work in partnership with their clients to fully understand their research requirements, and they oversee each project for their clients.

 

Our clients are assured that every single research project they commission, whether large or small, will be treated with the greatest care and attention, and the data they receive will be of the highest quality. That’s a promise.

Mobile

We provide a state-of-the-art mobile data collection service that includes Mobile-On-The-Go, App-based and IVR-SMS surveys.

Online

From customer satisfaction surveys to complex choice modelling, we cover all methods of online research fieldwork.

Face to Face

Our highly experienced field force specialise in knowing how to find, approach and speak to people in-person and in any location.

Telephone

Whether a CATI consumer study or interviewing hard to reach senior B2B audiences – we ensure high complete rates.

Blended

We provide a mixed-mode data collection service to ensure an integrated approach to delivering all your data output needs.

Qualitative

We help our clients immerse themselves in conversations with their customers from all walks of life, from consumer to business audiences.

Quantitative

We specialise in providing a customised quant solution through a consistent delivery of quantitative data and high quality outputs.

Data Analytics

We manage a wide range of data analytics projects, helping you turn complex datasets into easy-to-understand actionable insights.

Reporting

We design dashboards that focus attention on key business drivers, actionable outcomes and the ability to make key business decisions.

STOREWORKS

STOREWORKS delivers cost-effective retail marketing data and insights to help retailers engage with different shopper audiences.

STOREWORKS from RED

STOREWORKS provides cost-effective retail marketing data and insights connecting your brand with any type of audience.

 

It offers all the solutions you need in one place – combined with a dedicated account manager to make sure you get the retail insights you need, as quickly and as cost-effectively as possible, so you only pay for what you need.

 

Please visit our STOREWORKS site for more information.

StoreWorks website

Delivering The Audiences You Want

Our focus is on ensuring that what we do for you delivers precisely what you need and when you need it.

We think that’s what ‘fit for purpose’ means.

Whether a consumer study or hard to reach, senior B2B audiences – RED guarantees a professional and intelligent approach when talking to customers.

VIEW ALL OUR AUDIENCES

B2C Audiences

B2C Demographics

Age • Gender • Sexual Orientation • Marital Status • Ethnicity/Race • Education Level • Social Grade/NS-SEC • Employment Status • Household Income • Own or Rent • Geography • Language

B2C Buyers & Shoppers

Retail & Online • Fashion • Groceries • Food & Drink • Health & Beauty • Entertainment • For The Home • Electronics • Telecoms • Utilities • Banking • Insurance • Auto • Travel For Leisure

B2C Cohorts

Young Consumers • Millennials • Savvy Parents • LGBTQ+ • Active Lifestyle • Travel Savvy • Fashionistas • Foodies • Technophiles • Gamers • Affluent Consumers • Enthusiasts & Junkies

B2B Audiences

B2B Firmographics

Business Type • Incorporation State • Main Industry • Annual Revenue • Number of Employees • Regions • Countries • Cities

B2B Sectors

Retail • FMCG • Fashion • Food & Drink • Telecoms • Technology • Travel & Leisure • Automotive • Financial Services • Media

B2B Individuals

Title • Occupation • Primary Roles • Functional Roles • Specific Departments • Executives • SME Owners • Purchase Decision Makers

Some of our clients

We work with some great organisations, large and small – in the UK and globally.

The belief that rigorous data collection is the foundation for all great research and insight sits at the heart of RED’s approach.
